page.title: 07Hailey,Oxfordshire.
page.content: Hailey is about one and a half miles from Witney.It has two quite big farms and farm land surrounds Hailey.There are three hundred and sixty people who live there.There is one village school with sixty five children in it.There used to be two churchs but one has closed down.There is one village hall which is used for all sorts of clubs.A mobile library comes to Hailey once every fortnight.There are two pubs, one post office and one butcher. There are about three hundred houses, some are made from Cotswold stone and pebble dash but most are made from brick. The main business is Fisher and Townsend,a builder.
